author: Christian Dysthe
comment: This is the notes app to get, especially if you are a Dropbox user. Not much to say really. Works wonderfully! The only thing o_O I could wish for is to be able to save a note without closing it. I have now been using this app for a couple of years and it's on my very small list of must-have apps. A great addition is that you can access you notes in your web browser also. The only thing I miss is to be able to print notes from my phone. Just buy it. It's so worth it supporting development of this great app! After another couple of years this is still one of my most used apps. Just updated and better than ever. Please make the web interface searchable! I keep updating this review since this app is one of the best and most used app on my phone.

author: Nazareno Tribouley
comment: Edit: completely stopped working, doesn't go past the password prompt which is a bummer because I have a lot of notes I can't access anymore. Waste of money.    Works as expected, although ever since I updated to Oreo it closes after adding/editing a note or unlocking the app. Hopefully it'll be fixed soon

I like it. But I keep getting conflicted versions from todo lists synced with Dropbox, despite the fact that I'm only editing and viewing the files in the app on a single device. So why are there conflicted versions? Perhaps this happens when I edit a list while offline and then the older Dropbox version is considered to be conflicting while in my opinion it just should be overwritten because it's older. This is a bit of an annoyance.

Been  using it for a few minutes And i've discovered That you cannot move notes from one notebook to another. Also, you cannot Rename A notebook. One other thing i've noticed is that it keeps running in the background. Author does not comment reviews To either acknowledge An issue Or provide solution. Other than these things, I like it. Not ready for primetime.. Use the free edition.

author: Amelia Myburgh
comment: I just love this,  but would love to know how big the memory is.  Can I save a whole book on it? I also love the password function and that I can add many photos. Thank you!

author: Xai
comment: Please add a search function in individual notes otherwise an awesome application

author: Don Scott
comment: Love it. It's the best. I can keep all my notes in one place, organized. Very good.

author: Muhammad Taufik
comment: ok

author: Atom Nous
comment: Idk why but I can't copy my writings. It also happens with some other note apps. Is it my phone or is it the app? Please answer, I feel like this app is the most perfect one out there. But I need to be able to copy and paste.

author: Jeng Viado
comment: Problem on creating folders solved! Even if there's a limit on folders you can create, this is simply the best notes app, and it syncs great with dropbox! Simple to access when you are on your PC, and you can bring everywhere when you are on your phone!
Have changed phones and would like notes to transfer over.  I have sent email but no response. Willing to pay for the app.  Anyone help me?

author: Tadeusz Michalak
comment: The old note used versions interpunction I transfer to a new mobile and now does not allow to use this function. Why?

author: Subzero Dev
comment: Great app. One question though, how to type in second "*" without turning it into bold format?

author: Bonnie Hamby
comment: It is impossible to find a good Note App at all, and I finally did! Thank you!! Fonts would be amazing!!!!!

author: chuki dee
comment: I love this app and I love recording my thoughts with it with the necessary timestamp and dark theme. I thank the developer for bringing about this app and keeping the up with the app updates. Never let "Notes" die. :)

author: Ramesh Joshi
comment: If particular file, we wish to chane from one folder to other, How to transfer to other  folder

author: Taha Khan
comment: admin ,after update, please just he!p its not working ,syncing not working and editing also!

author: Kartika Id
comment: Can't edit the title on the web version

author: Veence Ramos
comment: I love the backup feature. I can still recover my files even after a factory reset

author: Vipul Gamit
comment: How to disable adds. In settings-general-the disable adds is not working

author: Vernelle Ross
comment: What a great notebook, it does everything a book can do,  write,  rewrite..
title: Reminders

author: Youssef Joe
comment: Best notes app that includes synchronisation and fingerprint authentication.

author: Jitev Singh
comment: Excellent !

author: Zafar Minhaz
comment: good app
Does exactly what I need, in a clean and simple way.

author: Connor Clark
comment: Use it all the time. Would recommend.

author: Mhamad Nabe
comment: It's awesome app, I'm use this to write my own notes.

author: Carol Metzger
comment: is there a way to download this update withoutWhy do you need to know my identity?! What I've written here is private and I have no illusions that the password will protect my privacy if you know my identity. I loved this app - why ruin a wonderful relationship by asking for my identity, the identity of my online accounts,   It's like going on a great day and then he ruins it at the end of the night by asking for my birth date and email address.

author: Vasil Gospodinov
comment: I have some issues. I am using timed lock.    If i remove the app from recent apps, or exit from it by back button, when it prompts for password, then the changes i have currently made are lost. I suggest adding an option in preferences to save changes when the app goes in background ( i e by home button, or switch to app button ).  Also an option to set permanent portrait orientation would be nice.

author: Rachael P.H.
comment: I have lots of written things in this app saved to drive, and I'd like to suggest more text formats like underline, block quotes, and listing. Converting it to lists is a nice addition, but I like text lists with sub-lists. Overall, it's my most favourite app to put notes. It can save dozens of  large paragraphs. 😁

author: Joe Satchton
comment: Nicely done... Needed replacement for old fave Simple Notepad which is not being updated for new 2017 Dropbox API hooks... This one is actually more full featured - fingerprint security is great and is fully functional with new Dropbox reqs... Main request from me is option to add lined notepad paper... No muss, no fuss little apps like these that work great and don't try to be jack of all trades are what I favor... Dev... Look at Simple Notepad and "steal" some stuff from there, mainly in some light visual customizations... Great job!

author: Aniket veer
comment: There is problem in the photo viewing. picture which has been captured by the camera does not zoom . Plz do something for that

author: Jeff Thomas
comment: It's a good notebook app.. the only problem is the autocorrect.. even when I save a word it doesn't let me use it without having to retype it 5 times.. we're all old enough to be able to write bad words, let's go ahead and stop trying to change the swear words! Grow up!

author: Philip C
comment: The best note app I've found, I can access my notes from my laptop browser & I can password protect my notes. So many positive features!

I paid for the application because I have the feeling that it will be a very good application in the near future, still have some nuances to perfect, I recommend put the option to record audio or at least add audio
Great for not too detailed note-taking. Can secure the app with a password. Organize notes into notebooks

author: Lisa N
comment: Couldn't have images or view documents from web. But that's not why I gave it a 1star. Can't get the app off your phone through traditional methods. I had to fin the app in my apps and uninstall through the install screen.

reply.author: Jacob Ras
reply.content:
Hi Lisa,

You can simply uninstall the app and it should be gone. I do nothing to prevent that!

Kind regards,
Jacob

author: Fabio Vilan
comment: Nice app, need just a little fix, why does it keep running in the background? It should sleep and became background free. Other than that is a wonderful app.

author: RUDHRANSH TUBE
comment: Very nice but one thing needed is it should make the title by writing the same just written in the first line of the note

author: Martina Arnoldi
comment: Uso questa app da molto e nei vari aggiornarmenti è stata migliorata sempre di più. È semplice ma funzionalissima, c'è la possibilità di mettere la password, i vari diari che si possono creare in cui mettere quante note si vogliono, l'ordine delle note, la formattazione del testo, la possibilità di aggiungere foto e il cestino dai cui recuperare file cancellati.
